# Galaxy-galaxy lensing signal for CMASS
# Please see Leauthaud et al. 2016 for details
# Assumed Cosmology is H0=100, Om=0.31, Ol=0.69
# Delta Sigma is computed in comoving coordinates
# col1 : R [h^-1 Mpc]
# col1 : Delta Sigma [h Msun pc^-2]
# col3 : Diagonal error from bootstrap resampling
